column4: he's looking for the next step from knoppix (which, surprisingly, he has had since yesterday)
and I'm trying to steer him away from slack, because I know nothing about it
bur[n] er: why do you think my favorite distros are debian (-based) and gentoo
bur[n] er: I need package management
bur[n] er: or, at the very least, something that can easily remove packages I don't like
btw, are there many themes for gnome included?  the screens I've seen look ugly imo
bur[n] er: hmm... I've never really looked at how to do that
bur[n] er: because I'm starting to like KDE more and more
in GNOME color schemes are a part of GTK+ themes.
I like the versioning scheme... it's shorter than the 2004XXXX type, and more precise than the gentoo 2004.X
is there a theme reminiscant of OS X?
not included in gnome-themes-extras, I don't think.
but there are plenty of them out there.
whether or not I can apt-get themes doesn't really concern me
